quoteText: We may release personally identifying information when we believe release is necessary to comply with lawful court orders. Any collected information associated with your use of the website (personal and non-personal) will be disclosed to government authorities or third parties only pursuant to a lawful request, subpoena, or other process that legally compels disclosure of that information.
title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
